resume.description: I went to Norman Henshilwood High School and studied Computer Applications and Technology, Physical Science, Pure Mathematics and Business Studies. I then matriculated in 2022.
I did a 6 month online course at HyperionDev where I learned HTML, CSS, Javascript and Bootstrap.

A Bootcamp program that provides you with the core fundamentals of Web Development, learning coding languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more coding techniques. We being taught interpersonal and self-development skills to take us further in life.

testimonials.name: Nizaam
testimonials.quotes: In the realm of coding, Shakeel reigns supreme. He's not just a brilliant coder; he's a mentor in the making.

testimonials.name: Anushqa
testimonials.quotes: His patience and guidance have been instrumental in my growth as a developer.

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.quotes: Shakeel is a highly creative, well-behaved, and dedicated individual who thrives on collaborating with his peers and excels at working on project assignments. He has acquired various skills and tools, including HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, VS Code, and wireframe. I am pleased to introduce him as an exceptional candidate anddeveloper.

testimonials.name: Caleb
testimonials.quotes: I am grateful to call Shakeel a close friend. He has great work ethic, analytical and problem solving skills. He thrives in collaborative settings as well as when he works on his own. He is kind, generous and hilarious. Shakeel would be a valuable asset to any organization.

testimonials.name: Kyle
testimonials.quotes: Shakeel? Oh, he's like the coding superhero of our office! He's always there to help out, making sure everyone's codes are as flawless as his.

testimonials.name: Aakifah
testimonials.quotes: Working with Shakeel on our website was a fantastic experience. His coding expertise and attention to detail ensured we had an outstanding final product.
